title: The Adventures of RJ the Mouse: The Forgotten Voice
description: RJ the Mouse loves nothing more than a good adventure, but this one is far different from any he's ever had before. Join him on a heartfelt journey to mysterious lands, where he meets a lovable hedgehog and embarks on an adventure that will span a lifetime.Will RJ's bravery, courage, and strength be enough to find the Forgotten Voice? Follow him on his quest to find out!If you enjoyed stories like Where the Wild Things Are and The Gruffalo or touching stories like The One and Only Ivan. You'll also love this heartfelt tale of adventure and courage! Buy your copy today!
author: Robby Silk
